definition: to circulate/to flow (esp. capital)/to intermingle/to merge/to become assimilated
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: The first portion discusses the development and the formation of OuYi"s opinions concerning integrating Confucianism with Buddhism."
sentences.chinese: 第一部分論述澫益儒佛融通思想的發展與形成。

sentences.english: The second portion discusses the basic path of OuYi's opinions.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分探討澫益儒佛融通思想的基本路徑。

sentences.english: Tom Lee campaign finance securities investment funds to update placement prospectuses .
sentences.chinese: 融通通利系列證券投資基金更新招募說明書。

sentences.english: Compensate trade and financing tenancy are two effective approaches to accommodate capital in a bank.
sentences.chinese: 補償貿易與融資租賃是企業融通資金的兩條有效途徑。

definition: to advance or retreat, each has its rules (idiom from Zhuangzi); many translations are possible
to run in parallel without hindrance/not mutually exclusive/two processes can be implemented without conflict
to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
